articles.description: Indiana returns from a lengthy break to face rival Purdue on Sunday afternoon at Simon Skjodt Assembly Hall. The Boilermakers are 19-8 overall, 11-5 in the Big Ten and have lost three straight games.
articles.content: Indiana returns from a lengthy break to face rival Purdue on Sunday afternoon at Simon Skjodt Assembly Hall. The Boilermakers are 19-8 overall, 11-5 in the Big Ten and have lost three straight games.… [+4635 chars]

articles.author: Jon Heath
articles.title: Broncos have identified talent at recent HBCU Legacy Bowl games - Broncos Wire
articles.description: Seven current NFL players participated in past HBCU Legacy Bowls, including a current Broncos pass rusher and an ex-Denver running back.
articles.content:
The 2025 HBCU Legacy Bowl will be played at Yulman Stadium in New Orleans this afternoon.
